name: test_e2e_with_logs[728_CRLF_RESP_004]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CRLF_RESP_004` |
| **Name** | XSS via CRLF Response Splitting |
| **Category** | CRLF |
| **Subcategory** | response_splitting |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `\r\n\r\n<script>alert(1)</script>`
- **Encoded**: `%0d%0a%0d%0a%3Cscript%3Ealert%281%29%3C%2Fscript%3E`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes
